clickPositionOffset

In ScreenSpaceOverlay canvases, this is in world space. In ScreenSpaceCamera canvases, this is in screen space.

Properties

DragFromClickPosition

If true, object is dragged from the point where it is clicked. If false, is dragged from the rect transform's pivot.

Declaration
public bool DragFromClickPosition { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean

Offset

A Vector for offsetting the transform pivot from the dragging pointer in world/canvas space, NOT screen space.

Declaration
